name: The thirty-two arms of the sea
name_original: The thirty-two arms of the sea
description: My first text adventure made with Twine. The story takes place in 1924, Northwest of Spain, while the country is in an unstable period of spies, war with Africa and arms sales to other nations. The character Urco was inspired by the French serials Louis Feuillade style and pulp protosuperheroes like Nyctalope, Fantomas, The Shadow, Mack Wan or Ōgon Bat.
